languages.text: "Это — лучшая догадка, что у меня есть. Напомню — он сказал: "Я должен Фиделио. Если б не "Покаяние"... Кому он еще мог считать себя должным, как не мстительной дочери — или невесте, или кто она там была — убитого им капитана? Это было бы очень в духе Денза — оставить все деньги не нюне-сыну, не идиоту-помощнику, а ловкой даме, что почти сумела его убить".

traits.locale_text: "Это — лучшая догадка, что у меня есть. Напомню — он сказал: "Я должен Фиделио. Если б не "Покаяние"... Кому он еще мог считать себя должным, как не мстительной дочери — или невесте, или кто она там была — убитого им капитана? Это было бы очень в духе Денза — оставить все деньги не нюне-сыну, не идиоту-помощнику, а ловкой даме, что почти сумела его убить".

languages.text: "It's my best guess. Let me remind you what he said, 'I owe Fidelio. If not for the Repentance...' Who else could he have been indebted to if not a vengeful daughter — or lover, or whoever she was — of a captain he'd killed? It would be a very Denz thing to do — to leave all the money not to his wimp of a son, not to his idiot first mate, but to the cunning lass who almost killed him."
languages.original_text: "Это — лучшая догадка, что у меня есть. Напомню — он сказал: "Я должен Фиделио. Если б не "Покаяние"... Кому он еще мог считать себя должным, как не мстительной дочери — или невесте, или кто она там была — убитого им капитана? Это было бы очень в духе Денза — оставить все деньги не нюне-сыну, не идиоту-помощнику, а ловкой даме, что почти сумела его убить".

traits.locale_text: "It's my best guess. Let me remind you what he said, 'I owe Fidelio. If not for the Repentance...' Who else could he have been indebted to if not to a vengeful daughter — or bride, or whoever she was — of a captain he'd killed? It would be a very Denz thing to do — to leave all the money not to his wimp of a son, not to his idiot mate, but to a sharp lady who had almost killed him."

Who else could he have been indebted to if not a vengeful daughter — or lover, or whoever she was — of a captain he'd killed? It would be a very Denz thing to do — to leave all the money not to his wimp of a son, not to his idiot first mate, but to the cunning lass who almost killed him."

languages.text: “这是我最靠谱的推测。我可以再提醒你一下他说过的话，‘我欠菲迪奥的，这也是为了忏悔……’。他杀死了那个舰长，那个舰长的女儿或爱人对他充满恨意。如果不是欠她，还能是欠谁？而且，他不打算把他所有财产留给他那个废物儿子，也不打算留给他那个蠢货大副，而是留给那个差点要了他命的狡猾姑娘，这很符合他的做事风格。”
languages.original_text: "It's my best guess. Let me remind you what he said, 'I owe Fidelio. If not for the Repentance...' Who else could he have been indebted to if not a vengeful daughter — or lover, or whoever she was — of a captain he'd killed? It would be a very Denz thing to do — to leave all the money not to his wimp of a son, not to his idiot first mate, but to the cunning lass who almost killed him."

traits.locale_text: “这是我最靠谱的推测。我可以再提醒你一下他说过的话，‘我欠菲迪奥的，这也是为了忏悔……’。他杀死了那个舰长，那个舰长的女儿或爱人对他充满恨意。如果不是欠她，还能是欠谁？而且，他不打算把他所有财产留给他那个废物儿子，也不打算留给他那个蠢货大副，而是留给那个差点要了他命的狡猾姑娘，这很符合他的做事风格。”

languages.text: «Es lo mejor que se me ocurre. Deje que le recuerde sus palabras: "Se lo debo a Fidelio. De no ser por el Arrepentimiento...". ¿A quién podría deberle algo, si no a la hija vengativa (o amante, o lo que fuera) de un capitán al que mató? Denz no dudaría en hacer algo así: dejarle el dinero no al inútil de su hijo ni al idiota de su contramaestre, sino a la astuta muchacha que casi le mata».
languages.original_text: "It's my best guess. Let me remind you what he said, 'I owe Fidelio. If not for the Repentance...' Who else could he have been indebted to if not a vengeful daughter — or lover, or whoever she was — of a captain he'd killed? It would be a very Denz thing to do — to leave all the money not to his wimp of a son, not to his idiot first mate, but to the cunning lass who almost killed him."

traits.locale_text: «Es lo mejor que se me ocurre. Deje que le recuerde sus palabras: "Se lo debo a Fidelio. De no ser por el Arrepentimiento...". ¿A quién podría deberle algo, si no a la hija vengativa (o amante, o lo que fuera) de un capitán al que mató? Denz no dudaría en hacer algo así: dejarle el dinero no al inútil de su hijo ni al idiota de su contramaestre, sino a la astuta muchacha que casi le mata».

languages.text: 「その可能性が高いかと。彼は確か、こんなことを言っていました…『フィデリオには借りがある。リペンタンスがなければ…』と。自分が殺した船長の復讐に燃える娘、あるいは愛人でも誰でも…借りがあるとすればそのなかの誰かに違いありません。それに、いかにも彼らしいではないですか。へたれの息子やバカな一等航海士ではなく、彼を殺しかけた狡猾な小娘に遺産を残すとは…デンツがやりそうなことです」
languages.original_text: "It's my best guess. Let me remind you what he said, 'I owe Fidelio. If not for the Repentance...' Who else could he have been indebted to if not a vengeful daughter — or lover, or whoever she was — of a captain he'd killed? It would be a very Denz thing to do — to leave all the money not to his wimp of a son, not to his idiot first mate, but to the cunning lass who almost killed him."

traits.locale_text: 「その可能性が高いかと。彼は確か、こんなことを言っていました…『フィデリオには借りがある。リペンタンスがなければ…』と。自分が殺した船長の復讐に燃える娘、あるいは愛人でも誰でも…借りがあるとすればそのなかの誰かに違いありません。それに、いかにも彼らしいではないですか。へたれの息子やバカな一等航海士ではなく、彼を殺しかけた狡猾な小娘に遺産を残すとは…デンツがやりそうなことです」

languages.text: "Das würde ich vermuten. Denkt an seine Worte: 'Ich schulde Fidelio etwas. Ohne die Repentanz ...' Wem könnte er etwas schulden, wenn nicht einer rachsüchtigen Tochter – oder Geliebten oder was immer – eines Captains, den er getötet hatte? Es wäre typisch für Denz – sein gesamtes Geld nicht seinem feigen Sohn oder seinem dummen Ersten Offizier zu hinterlassen, sondern dem fähigen Mädchen, das ihn fast umgebracht hätte."
languages.original_text: "It's my best guess. Let me remind you what he said, 'I owe Fidelio. If not for the Repentance...' Who else could he have been indebted to if not a vengeful daughter — or lover, or whoever she was — of a captain he'd killed? It would be a very Denz thing to do — to leave all the money not to his wimp of a son, not to his idiot first mate, but to the cunning lass who almost killed him."

traits.locale_text: "Das würde ich vermuten. Denkt an seine Worte: 'Ich schulde Fidelio etwas. Ohne die Repentanz ...' Wem könnte er etwas schulden, wenn nicht einer rachsüchtigen Tochter – oder Geliebten oder was immer – eines Captains, den er getötet hatte? Es wäre typisch für Denz – sein gesamtes Geld nicht seinem feigen Sohn oder seinem dummen Ersten Offizier zu hinterlassen, sondern dem fähigen Mädchen, das ihn fast umgebracht hätte."

languages.text: « C'est l'hypothèse la plus probable. Rappelez-vous ce qu'il a dit : "J'ai une dette envers Fidélio. Sans Repentance..." Envers qui aurait-il pu contracter une dette, si ce n'est la fille – ou l'amante, ou que sais-je encore – du capitaine qu'il a tué ? Ce serait tout à fait lui, ça : léguer sa fortune non pas à son dégonflé de fils ni à son imbécile de premier lieutenant, mais à la petite maline qui a bien failli le tuer. »
languages.original_text: "It's my best guess. Let me remind you what he said, 'I owe Fidelio. If not for the Repentance...' Who else could he have been indebted to if not a vengeful daughter — or lover, or whoever she was — of a captain he'd killed? It would be a very Denz thing to do — to leave all the money not to his wimp of a son, not to his idiot first mate, but to the cunning lass who almost killed him."

traits.locale_text: « C'est l'hypothèse la plus probable. Rappelez-vous ce qu'il a dit : "J'ai une dette envers Fidélio. Sans Repentance..." Envers qui aurait-il pu contracter une dette, si ce n'est la fille – ou l'amante, ou que sais-je encore – du capitaine qu'il a tué ? Ce serait tout à fait lui, ça : léguer sa fortune non pas à son dégonflé de fils ni à son imbécile de premier lieutenant, mais à la petite maline qui a bien failli le tuer. »

languages.text: "Öyle tahmin ediyorum. Denz'in sözlerini hatırlatayım: 'Fidelio'ya borçluyum. Tövbe olmasaydı...' Öldürdüğü kaptanın intikam peşindeki kızına, âşığına ya da her kimse ona değil de kime borçlu olacak? Tüm parasını pısırık oğluna veya mankafa ikinci kaptanına değil de az kalsın canını alacak olan kurnaz bir hatuna bırakmak, tam Denz'den beklenecek hareket."
languages.original_text: "It's my best guess. Let me remind you what he said, 'I owe Fidelio. If not for the Repentance...' Who else could he have been indebted to if not a vengeful daughter — or lover, or whoever she was — of a captain he'd killed? It would be a very Denz thing to do — to leave all the money not to his wimp of a son, not to his idiot first mate, but to the cunning lass who almost killed him."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle tahmin ediyorum. Söylediklerini hatırlatayım: 'Fidelio'ya borçluyum. Tövbe olmasaydı...' Öldürdüğü kaptanın intikam peşindeki evladına, sevgilisine veya her kimse ona değil de kime borçlu olacak? Tüm parasını pısırık oğluna ya da aptal sağ koluna değil, az kalsın canını alacak olan fettan bir kıza bırakmak tam Denz'den beklenecek bir şey."
